content: The Skull of Turtle Treasure is obtained upon defeating any Turtle Treasure enemy in Valley of Ecstasy in Chapter 3 - The New West. Simply farm the enemy until it drops.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Skull_of_Turtle_Treasure.md', within the main section titled 'Skull of Turtle Treasure'.
The content is as follows:
The Skull of Turtle Treasure is obtained upon defeating any Turtle Treasure enemy in Valley of Ecstasy in Chapter 3 - The New West. Simply farm the enemy until it drops.
